l10n.confirmResetGameDescription: The current game will reset and all the responses from this attempt will be lost. Do you want to proceed?
l10n.gameStartsOverDescription: The presenter just restarted the game. Click below to play again
l10n.allowRetryDescription: Show the "Retry" button on each participant screen
l10n.studentMultipleAnswersLabel: You can type up to :num response(s)
l10n.gameLockedStatus: Game is locked, click to unlock.
l10n.gameNotLockedStatus: Game is in progress, click to lock.
l10n.gameLockedDialogDescription: The activity has been locked by the instructor, who may choose to open it up again later.
l10n.confirmUnlockRetryDescription: By allowing retry you will unlock the activity. Do you want to proceed?

errors.expiredDescription: This game was available until :timestamp, and has now been closed
errors.duplicateSessionDescription: You have opened the game in a different window.
errors.duplicateSessionInstructions: Press reload to continue the game in this window.
errors.connectionFailedInstructions: Failed to connect to the game server. Please reload the page.
errors.tooManyUsersDescription: This game has exceeded the max number of concurrent players. Please try again later.

a11y.wordCloudAltText: Word cloud indicating the frequency of results, see tabular list for values.

question: How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
